title: New Yorkers and Tourists on Trump’s Security Costs: ‘A Ridiculous Waste of Taxpayers’ Money’
text:
New Yorkers and Tourists on Trump’s Security Costs: ‘A Ridiculous Waste of Taxpayers’ Money’ by Justin Baragona | 4:34 pm, March 23rd, 2017 
In the wake of recent reports highlighting the security costs to taxpayers for President Donald Trump’s trips to Mar-a-Lago as well as for his wife and son to continue to live full-time at Trump Tower , Mediaite’s Travis Irvine took to the streets of New York to ask people their thoughts. 
Asking one woman what she thinks of the “millions of dollars that are being spent to secure Trump Tower,” Irvine was told that it was “absolutely ridiculous” and an “insult to the intelligence of all Americans.” 
“It’s a ridiculous waste of taxpayers’ money,” one man said. “I mean, absolutely insane.” 
However, not all folks that Irvine encountered on the streets of the Big Apple were upset with the money being spent. 
“To be honest with you, I think it’s worth it,” one couple stated. They noted that the president is making some “great moves” and “he’s doing a lot for this country.”
